entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
